attributes.action: add mental health trigger warnings to films
attributes.background: TV shows documentaries all have trigger warnings if there are scenes of self harm or suicide. Films have warnings of violence and sex so why not for mental health issues? scenes of self harm or suicide can extremely trigger someone with mental health issues.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the British Board of Film Classification. The BBFC is a non-governmental body and is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

The BBFC carries out periodic consultations with the public about its classification system. You can find out more about its work here:

https://www.bbfc.co.uk/
